introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: WSXJS ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our open-source framework and website.

dataCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: As an open-source project, we collect minimal information:

items.usage: Usage analytics (anonymized) to improve the framework
items.errors: Error logs and crash reports to fix bugs
items.device: Device and browser information for compatibility testing

dataUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the collected information to:

items.improve: Improve and maintain the WSXJS framework
items.communicate: Respond to your inquiries and provide support

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information. We may share anonymized, aggregated data with third-party analytics services to help us understand how the framework is used.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to analyze website traffic and improve user experience. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

userRights.title: 7. Your Rights
userRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

items.access: Right to access your personal data
items.delete: Right to request deletion of your data
items.object: Right to object to processing of your data

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
